statements: SELECT agreement_id, agreement_date, licensee_name, licensor_name, duration_months, royalty_rate FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE licensee_name = 'Alice Smith';
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_date, licensee_name FROM music_licensing_agreements ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT licensor_name, duration_months, royalty_rate FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE royalty_rate > 0.5;
SELECT agreement_id, licensor_name, duration_months FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE agreement_id BETWEEN 100 and 200;
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE agreement_id = 100
SELECT licensee_name, licensor_name, royalty_rate FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE duration_months > 12 ORDER BY royalty_rate DESC
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_date, licensee_name, licensor_name FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE agreement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT licensor_name, SUM(royalty_rate) AS total_royalties FROM music_licensing_agreements GROUP BY licensor_name HAVING total_royalties > 50000
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements ORDER BY duration_months ASC, agreement_date DESC
SELECT id, agreement_name, license_type FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT * FROM contracts_tracking;
SELECT contract_id, company, license_term FROM contracts_tracking;
SELECT agreement_name, license_type, start_date, end_date FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE license_type = 'Public Performance';
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM music_licensing_agreements ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, company FROM contracts_tracking WHERE license_term = 'Single Use' ORDER BY contract_date ASC;
SELECT agreement_name, license_type, start_date, end_date FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT contract_id, agreement_name, license_type, company, contract_date FROM music_licensing_agreements INNER JOIN contracts_tracking ON music_licensing_agreements.id = contracts_tracking.agreement_id ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name FROM music_licensing_agreements ORDER BY agreement_id DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, agreement_type FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE artist_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_date FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE agreement_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, contract_value, contract_date FROM contract_details WHERE contract_value > 1000 ORDER BY contract_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, agreement_type FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE agreement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, agreement_type, agreement_date FROM music_licensing_agreements ORDER BY agreement_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_date, contract_value, artist_name FROM contract_details INNER JOIN music_licensing_agreements ON contract_details.agreement_id = music_licensing_agreements.agreement_id;

SELECT tracking_id, license_status, tracking_date, agreement_type FROM license_tracking INNER JOIN contract_details ON license_tracking.contract_id = contract_details.contract_id INNER JOIN music_licensing_agreements ON contract_details.agreement_id = music_licensing_agreements.agreement_id WHERE artist_name = 'Artist1';
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, agreement_date FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE agreement_type = 'License';
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, expiration_date FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM licensing_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT track_name, genre, length_minutes FROM music_tracks WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, agreement_type FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE is_active = 1
SELECT company_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM licensing_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT track_name, genre, length_minutes FROM music_tracks WHERE genre = 'Rock' AND length_minutes > 4
SELECT royalty_id, agreement_id, track_id, royalty_amount, payment_date FROM royalties WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, start_date FROM music_licensing_agreements ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_id, license_type, agreement_terms FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE license_type = 'Single Use License';
SELECT party_name, role FROM parties_involved WHERE role = 'Licensee' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT term_name, term_description FROM contract_terms WHERE term_description LIKE '%royalties%';
SELECT * FROM music_licensing_agreements;
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, license_type FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE license_type = 'Single Use';
SELECT agreement_id, artist_name, start_date, end_date FROM music_licensing_agreements WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT contract_id, term_name, term_description FROM contract_terms WHERE agreement_id = 101 ORDER BY term_name DESC;
SELECT party_name, role FROM parties_involved WHERE role IN ('Producer', 'Musician') ORDER BY party_name;
